testcase.purpose: Check if in hsl(), the hus only a number value can be given
testcase.component: WebAPI/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Color Module Level 3

spec.spec_statement: Hue is represented as an angle of the color circle. This angle is so typically measured in degrees that the unit is implicit in CSS; syntactically, only a <number> is given

testcase.purpose: Check if hsl() can has space
testcase.component: WebAPI/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Color Module Level 3

spec.spec_statement: The format of an HSLA color value in the functional notation is ‘hsla(’ followed by the hue in degrees, saturation and lightness as a percentage, and an <alphavalue>, followed by ‘)’. White space characters are allowed around the numerical values.

testcase.purpose: Check if the color keyword transparent and color value rgba(0,0,0,0) have same effect
testcase.component: WebAPI/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Color Module Level 3

spec.spec_statement: The computed value of the keyword ‘transparent’ is the quadruplet of all zero numerical RGBA values, e.g. rgba(0,0,0,0).
